subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Host Chelsea defeated Benfica, 2-1, on goals by Frank Lampard and Raul Meireles for a 3-1 aggregate win on Wednesday night and will play the defending champion Barcelona in the Champions League semifinals.
snippet: Host Chelsea defeated Benfica, 2-1, on goals by Frank Lampard and Raul Meireles for a 3-1 aggregate win on Wednesday night and will play the defending champion Barcelona in the Champions League semifinals.
